Quickly Switch between Apps by Unlimited Floating Shortcuts
Click to Select Package of Icons
Move Super Shortcuts Icon to Home Screen

This Permission Allows me to Get List of your Most Used Apps to Set them as Super Shortcuts

After Granting Usage Access Permission, Restart App & Wait to See Done! Message
I Need Accessibility Service to Enter Multi-Window Mode

Split Super Shortcuts ᴾᴿᴼ | This permission gives me the ability to create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously (Android 7 & Higher)

♿ How it Helps People with Disability?
It is difficult for people with disability to open an app Or switch between apps. I am using Accessibility Service to enter Multi-Window Mode to open two apps together.
Split Super Shortcuts ᴾᴿᴼ | This permission gives me the ability to create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously (Android 7 & Higher)

This Permission Allows Me to Create Multi-Window Mode & Open Pair of Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously.
(Android 7 & Higher)

♿ How it Helps People with Disability?
It is Difficult for People with Disability to Open an App Or Switch Between Apps.
So, I am Using Accessibility Service to Create Multi-Window Mode to Open Two Apps Together.

Apps Selected by Smart Pick
